articles.title: Queen could sell their catalogue to Sony for $1bn - BBC.com
articles.description: If the sale takes place, it will be the biggest deal of its kind in the history of recorded music.
articles.content:
Mark Savage,Music Correspondent
Freddie Mercury, who died in 1991, was Queen's dynamic and charismatic frontman
Sony Music is reportedly in talks to buy the music catalogue of the rock band Queen, … [+3760 chars]
